Scripts.OnLoad:
MixinAndLoadScripts(self, "CAClassButtonMixin") self.Icon:ClearAllPoints() self.Icon:SetPoint("CENTER") self.Icon:SetSize(46, 46) SetPortraitToTexture(self.Icon, "Interface\\Icons\\inv_misc_spyglass_02")
-- re-write what CAClassButtonMixin sets self:SetScript("OnClick", function() CharacterAdvancement:SelectBrowser() end)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOM") GameTooltip:SetText(SHARE_BUILD, 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(SHARE_BUILD_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound(SOUNDKIT.CHAT_SCROLL_BUTTON) local link = CharacterAdvancementUtil.GetBuildWebURL() if link then Internal_CopyToClipboard(link) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip_GenericTooltip(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") if self.tooltipExtra then GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltipExtra, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.tooltipTitle = RESET_ALL_SPELLS self.tooltipText = RESET_ALL_SPELLS_TOOLTIP if not C_Player:IsHero() then self:Hide() end MagicButton_OnLoad(self)
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip_GenericTooltip(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") if self.tooltipExtra then GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltipExtra, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.tooltipTitle = RESET_ALL_TALENTS self.tooltipText = RESET_ALL_TALENTS_TOOLTIP if not C_Player:IsHero() then self:SetWidth(240) self:ClearAndSetPoint("CENTER", 24, 2) end MagicButton_OnLoad(self)
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip_GenericTooltip(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") if self.tooltipExtra then GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltipExtra, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
ScrollFrame_OnLoad(self); self.scrollbar = _G[self:GetName().."ScrollBar"] self.scrollUpButton = _G[self.scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollUpButton"] self.scrollDownButton = _G[self.scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollDownButton"] self.scrollbar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPRIGHT", 2, -9) self.scrollbar:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 2, 17)
self.scrollbar:Hide()
Scripts.OnMouseWheel:
local maxOffset = self:GetVerticalScrollRange() local scroll = math.clamp(self:GetVerticalScroll() - (delta * 11), 0, maxOffset) self:SetVerticalScroll(scroll)
ScrollFrameTemplate_OnMouseWheel(self, delta)
